findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the LEONS Token implementation, there are two privileged accounts, i.e., owner and operator. These accounts play a critical role in governing and regulating system-wide operations.

findings.title: Meaningful Events For Important State Changes
findings.description: In Ethereum, events are indispensable and mainly used to record runtime dynamics. However, there is a lack of emitting related events to reflect important state changes in Leonicornswap contract.
